metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9751 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: opcodes/rl78-decode.opc in GNU Binutils 2.28 has an unbounded GETBYTEmacro, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (bufferoverflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by mishandling of this fileduring "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
